featured.text: Bekoji’s legend Derartu Tulu, who won the 10,000-meter Olympic gold medals in 1992 and 2000, is a national hero.
All these kids share the same dream: Some day they could become another Derartu Tulu. 53.

definition.zh_def: 一種在某些文化中用於儀式或傳統的舞蹈或音樂形式。
definition.en_def: A form of dance or music used in rituals or traditions in certain cultures.
definition.example: The tulu performance captivated the audience with its vibrant movements and rhythmic sounds.
